import React, {Component} from 'react'; class AddCV extends Component { state = { name: null, lastname: null, phone:null, email:null, education:null, workExperience:null, professionalSkills:null } onChange = event => { const {name, value} = event.target; this.setState({ [name]:value }) } render() { return (

Add CV

); } } export default AddCV;
